constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 81 (Thursday, May 12, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. NORMAN:
H.R. 7761.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8
[Page H4921]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

title: To authorize the President to award the Medal of Honor to James Capers, Jr. for acts of valor as a member of the Marine Corps during the Vietnam War.
